snippet: With a 3-0 victory over the Braves in Atlanta, the Yankees reclaimed a piece of first place in the American League East for the first time since April 24.
lead_paragraph: With a 3-0 victory over the Braves in Atlanta, the Yankees reclaimed a piece of first place in the American League East for the first time since April 24.

headline.seo: Yankees Return to First Place in A.L. East
headline.main: Yankees Return to First Place in A.L. East
